programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.desc: The Yankees' Clarke Schmidt continues his belated start to 2025 in a game against the Rays. Schmidt (0-1, 5.52 ERA) makes his fourth appearance since recovering from a shoulder injury. Tampa Bay starYandy Díaz is 5-for-12 versus the right-hander.
